word_mean: 〔USP〕灰黄霉素：由灰黄霉(penicillium griseofulvum)产生，或用其他方法制成的一种抗生素，C17H17ClO6，呈白色或乳白色粉末。用作治疗手、足、指(趾)甲及头皮霉菌感染的抗霉菌药，口服用

PerfectNetExp.abs: ... . . .定的致癌性毒素见附表。②抗生素(antibiotics)，除氯霉素(chloramphenicol)和灰黄霉素(griseofulvin)为抗菌药物外，其余为抗肿瘤药物，如放线菌素类(actinomycins)、丝裂霉素(mitomyci.

list.abs: griseille yarn 织制黑白提花绸的丝线griseofulvin tablet 灰黄霉素片griseofulvin 灰黄霉素

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1930s: from the modern Latin binomial, from medieval Latin griseus 'greyish' + Latin fulvus 'reddish yellow'

means.word_mean: 1. a kind of penicillin (a fungicidal antibiotic with the trade name Fulvicin) produced by molds of the genus Penicillium
